text: Ronald Vannucci Jr. (born February 15, 1976) is an American musician. He is best known for being the drummer for the American rock band the Killers. Vannucci is also involved in a side project called Big Talk, and became the drummer of the Rentals in 2018. Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American drummers Category:Musicians from Las Vegas
title: Ronnie Vannucci Jr.
